conversion_verification.notes: Successful isometric cutaway conversion with clear wall geometry.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D depth, wall thickness, and isometric projection.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Room configuration and adjacency are perfect; balcony and utility area geometry are correctly identified.

interior_elements.notes: High fidelity in furniture mapping, including specific bathroom fixtures and kitchen counters.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with logical lighting; semi-transparent door swings improve readability.

detected_errors.description: The balcony door/window opening is slightly simplified compared to the specific 2D mullion detail.

summary: High-fidelity 3D conversion that accurately translates architectural dimensions and interior layout into a clear isometric model.
